text.config.advancements_reloaded.title: Advancements Reloaded
text.config.advancements_reloaded.option:
[true] Display the criteria sidebar in the advancement screen
[false] Hide the criteria sidebar in the advancement screen. Use this to toggle the visibility of the criteria sidebar.

[true] Display the description text within the criteria area
[false] Hide the description text in the criteria area. Use this to toggle the visibility of additional information in the criteria area.

[true] Display the criteria in alphabetical order
[false] Display the criteria in the order they were are defined in the advancement.
Choose the style of the background in the advancement screen.

The height of the header area, measured in pixels.
Adjust this value to increase or decrease the vertical space for the header.

The height of the footer area, measured in pixels.
Adjust this value to increase or decrease the vertical space for the footer.

The width of the criteria area, measured in pixels.
This determines how much horizontal space is allocated for displaying criteria.

The maximum number of widgets that can be displayed in the header area.
This sets the upper limit for how many interactive elements can be shown in the header.

Warning: Be careful because too many widgets can cause some to be hidden off-screen.

The maximum number of widgets that can be displayed in the footer area.
This sets the upper limit for how many interactive elements can be shown in the footer.

Warning: Be careful because too many widgets can cause some to be hidden off-screen.
